mapper.select: SELECT code, ( SELECT group_concat(name ORDER BY LENGTH(code) SEPARATOR '-' ) FROM sys_department WHERE #{departmenCode} LIKE CONCAT('', code, '%') ) AS fullName FROM sys_department WHERE code = #{departmentCode}

SELECT sys_role.id, sys_role.role_code, sys_role.role_name FROM sys_role LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id WHERE sys_user_role.user_id = #{userId} AND sys_role.deleted = false

SELECT sys_permission.id, sys_permission.name, sys_permission.permission_value FROM sys_permission LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_role_permission ON sys_role_permission.permission_id = sys_permission.id WHERE sys_role_permission.role_id IN (#{roleIds}) AND sys_permission.deleted = false
